options.text: Develop musical skill, discipline and enjoyment

questions.answer: Develop musical skill, discipline and enjoyment

questions.question: What is instrumental music?
questions.answer: Instrumental music is music produced using musical instruments without singing.

questions.question: Which art form is instrumental music?
questions.answer: Instrumental music is a performing art.

questions.question: What is mainly used in instrumental music?
Is singing used in instrumental music?
Why is instrumental music taught in school?
questions.answer: To develop musical understanding and interest.

questions.question: What is a musical instrument?
questions.answer: An object used to produce musical sound.

What are wind instruments?
questions.answer: Instruments that produce sound by blowing air.

What are percussion instruments?
questions.answer: Instruments that produce sound when struck.
